name: Merge Money
description:
Looking for idle game?
Looking for clicker game?
Looking for merge game?
Money doesn't grow on tree? Yes it does!
You will find enjoyment in this relaxing idle clicker merge game: Merge Money!

Merge Money is a simple idle clicker merge game. Place some pots and grow trees. Drag and drop similar pots together to get better pots. Every once in a while every pot will generate some money. The better pots, the better tree you get. The better tree, more money will grow!

You can also purchase new pots to fill the spots.
You can also tap on the pots to get money faster!
You can also purchase boosts to get more money!
Here bee goes! Get free Legendary Gifts from the bees.

FEATURES
- Money growing trees!
- Simple idle clicker game
- Drag and drop merge
- Boosts to get more money faster
- Bees for a random reward

HOW TO PLAY
- Buy pots
- Plant tree
- Collect money
- Profit

Like the game? Give us your feedback!

If you have any questions or comments, feel free to contact us at support@vgamestd.com

Privacy Policy: http://policy.vgamestd.com/Merge%20Money
